mapper.update:
update TD_TENANT_APP_PROMOTION set
tenant_id=#{tenantId},
project_id=#{projectId},
crowd_id=#{crowdId},
run_date=#{runDate},
platform=#{platform},
app_hash=#{appHash},
active_hour_number=#{activeHourNumber},
active_all_number=#{activeAllNumber},
active_proportion=#{activeProportion},
active_city_proportion=#{activeCityProportion},
significance_value=#{significanceValue},
app_type=#{appType},
hour=#{hour},
cycle_statistics=#{cycleStatistics},
start_date=#{startDate},
end_date=#{endDate},
type_id=#{typeId},
type_name=#{typeName},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.tenant_id, s.crowd_id, s.platform, s.app_hash, s.app_type, s.hour, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.type_id, s.type_name, SUM(IFNULL(s.active_hour_number,0)) as active_hour_number, SUM(IFNULL(s.active_all_number,0)) AS active_all_number, AVG(IFNULL(s.active_proportion,0)) AS active_proportion, AVG(IFNULL(s.active_city_proportion,0)) AS active_city_proportion, AVG(IFNULL(s.significance_value,0)) AS significance_value FROM TD_TENANT_APP_PROMOTION s WHERE s.project_id IN ( SELECT r.project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION r WHERE r.project_parent_id = #{projectId}) AND s.run_date = #{runDate} GROUP BY s.tenant_id, s.crowd_id, s.platform, s.app_hash, s.app_type, s.hour, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.type_id, s.type_name
mapper.delete: delete from TD_TENANT_APP_PROMOTION where project_id = #{projectId} and run_date = #{runDate}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO TD_TENANT_APP_PROMOTION(tenant_id, project_id, crowd_id, run_date, platform, app_hash, active_hour_number, active_all_number, active_proportion, active_city_proportion, significance_value, app_type, hour, cycle_statistics, start_date, end_date, type_id, type_name) SELECT t.tenant_id, d.project_id, c.crowd_id, t.run_date, t.platform, t.app_hash, t.active_hour_number, t.active_all_number, t.active_proportion, t.active_city_proportion, t.significance_value, t.app_type, t.hour, t.cycle_statistics, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.type_id, t.type_name FROM (SELECT s.tenant_id, s.type, s.run_date, s.platform, s.app_hash, s.app_type, s.hour, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.type_id, s.type_name, SUM(IFNULL(s.active_hour_number,0)) as active_hour_number, SUM(IFNULL(s.active_all_number,0)) AS active_all_number, AVG(IFNULL(s.active_proportion,0)) AS active_proportion, AVG(IFNULL(s.active_city_proportion,0)) AS active_city_proportion, AVG(IFNULL(s.significance_value,0)) AS significance_value FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tb.tenant_id, cd.type, tb.run_date, tb.platform, tb.app_hash, tb.app_type, tb.hour, tb.cycle_statistics, tb.start_date, tb.end_date, tb.type_id, tb.type_name, tb.active_hour_number, tb.active_all_number, tb.active_proportion, tb.active_city_proportion, tb.significance_value, tb.project_id FROM TD_TENANT_APP_PROMOTION tb JOIN TD_CROWD cd ON tb.project_id = cd.attr1 AND tb.crowd_id = cd.id WHERE tb.project_id IN ( SELECT r.project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION r WHERE r.project_parent_id = #{projectId}) AND tb.run_date = #{runDate} )s GROUP BY s.tenant_id, s.type, s.run_date, s.platform, s.app_hash, s.app_type, s.hour, s.cycle_statistics, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.type_id, s.type_name )t, (SELECT DISTINCT project_parent_id AS project_id FROM TD_PROJECT_RELATION WHERE project_parent_id = #{projectId} )d, (SELECT DISTINCT id AS crowd_id, type, attr1 FROM TD_CROWD )c WHERE c.attr1 = d.project_id AND c.type = t.type
